channel.title: cash flow on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in cash flow on FinanClub

item.title: MO
item.description: score:9 Chances: Altria’s consistent cash flow to support dividend payments. Positive Q2 earnings results beating expectations. Steady performance against industry headwinds. Juul Labs seeking fundraising efforts. Risks: Longevity concerns over Altria’s cash cow business. Market competition and regulatory challenges for tobacco industry. Potential risks associated with Juul Labs’ fundraising and performance.

item.title: ENB
item.description: score:71 Chances: Enbridge has a history of paying dividends and steady growth. Enbridge generated positive distributable cash flow in the second quarter. Enbridge’s natural gas distribution business serves millions of customers. Enbridge reported higher profit in the second quarter due to increased oil volumes.

item.title: GOOG
item.description: score:31 Chances: Alphabet’s subsidiary Waymo and GM’s Cruise received regulatory approval for expanding driverless robotaxi services. GOOG’s positive cash flow generation and potential spending opportunities. Alphabet’s stock still within a buy zone after a recent breakout. Risks: Tech companies cutting spending on the future may impact GOOG’s long-term growth.
